Title: Imposes a tax on out-of-state transfers, dividends, payments, and loans by certain accident and health insurance companies and health maintenance organizations
Summary: Imposes a tax on out-of-state transfers, dividends, payments, and loans by certain accident and health insurance companies and health maintenance organizations to be deposited in the New York state agency trust fund, distressed provider assistance account.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to imposing a tax on out-of-state transfers, dividends, payments, and loans by certain accident and health insurance companies and health maintenance organizations
